snippet.title: Chained Echoes - Trailer 2022
snippet.description:
Take up your sword, channel your magic or board your Mech. Chained Echoes is a 16-bit SNES style RPG set in a fantasy world where dragons are as common as piloted mechanical suits.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChainedEchoes
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/txj5J4k
________________________
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1229240/Chained_Echoes/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/de/game/chained_echoes
